languages.text: Офицерский пост: Ван Калокс на связи. Перед нами — так называемые Врата Паутины. Артефакт, который используют ксеносы, чтобы попасть в свое, назовем это так, колдовское владение. Они позволяют эльдарам быстро перемещаться по сектору, и служат убежищем для самого неприятного племени из них — уже знакомых нам {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}.

Officers station: Van Calox here. What we see before us is a Webway Gate. An artefact that xenos use to get to their... sorcerous realm, so to speak. It allows Aeldari to get around the sector quickly and serves as a hideout for their most unpleasant tribe — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, whom we have already met.
languages.original_text: Офицерский пост: Ван Калокс на связи. Перед нами — так называемые Врата Паутины. Артефакт, который используют ксеносы, чтобы попасть в свое, назовем это так, колдовское владение. Они позволяют эльдарам быстро перемещаться по сектору, и служат убежищем для самого неприятного племени из них — уже знакомых нам {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}.

It allows Aeldari to get around the sector quickly and serves as a hideout for their most unpleasant tribe — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, whom we have already met.

An artifact that xenos use to get to their... sorcerous realm, so to speak. It allows Aeldari to get around the sector quickly and serves as a hideout for their most unpleasant tribe — the Drukhari, which we have already met.

It allows Aeldari to get around the sector quickly and serves as a hideout for their most unpleasant tribe — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, whom we have already met.

Officers station: Van Calox here. What we see before us is a Webway Gate. An artefact that xenos use to get to their... sorcerous realm, so to speak. It allows Aeldari to get around the sector quickly and serves as a hideout for their most unpleasant tribe — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, whom we have already met.

languages.text: Puesto de oficiales: Al habla van Calox. Lo que tenemos delante es un portal de la Telaraña. Es un artefacto que los xenos usan para llegar a su... reino mágico, por llamarlo de alguna manera. Los Aeldari lo usan para cruzar rápidamente el sector y sirve de escondite para su tribu más desagradable: los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, con quienes ya nos hemos cruzado.
languages.original_text: Officers station: Van Calox here. What we see before us is a Webway Gate. An artefact that xenos use to get to their... sorcerous realm, so to speak. It allows Aeldari to get around the sector quickly and serves as a hideout for their most unpleasant tribe — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, whom we have already met.

traits.locale_text: Puesto de oficiales: Al habla van Calox. Lo que tenemos delante es un portal de la Telaraña. Es un artefacto que los xenos usan para llegar a su... reino mágico, por llamarlo de alguna manera. Los Aeldari lo usan para cruzar rápidamente el sector y sirve de escondite para su tribu más desagradable: los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, con quienes ya nos hemos cruzado.

languages.text: 军官站：这里是冯·卡洛克斯，我们面前的这个东西叫做网道门。异形会通过这件造物，进入他们的……这么说吧，巫术领域。有了它，艾达灵族就可以在这片区域快速行动，而且他们最臭名昭著的分支{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}，会把这里当做他们的藏身之地。我们已经和那群家伙打过交道了。
languages.original_text: Officers station: Van Calox here. What we see before us is a Webway Gate. An artefact that xenos use to get to their... sorcerous realm, so to speak. It allows Aeldari to get around the sector quickly and serves as a hideout for their most unpleasant tribe — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, whom we have already met.

traits.locale_text: 军官站：这里是冯·卡洛克斯，我们面前的这个东西叫做网道门。异形会通过这件造物，进入他们的……这么说吧，巫术领域。有了它，艾达灵族就可以在这片区域快速行动，而且他们最臭名昭著的分支{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}，会把这里当做他们的藏身之地。我们已经和那群家伙打过交道了。

languages.text: 士官室：こちらヴァン・キャロックス。前方に見えるのは網辻門だ。異種族のアーチファクトで…奴らの魔法が宿る土地へと繋がる門、というところだ。こいつのおかげでアエルダリはセクターをあっという間に移動できるし、最悪な部族の隠れ家にもなっている…以前対峙した{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}のな。
languages.original_text: Officers station: Van Calox here. What we see before us is a Webway Gate. An artefact that xenos use to get to their... sorcerous realm, so to speak. It allows Aeldari to get around the sector quickly and serves as a hideout for their most unpleasant tribe — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, whom we have already met.

traits.locale_text: 士官室：こちらヴァン・キャロックス。前方に見えるのは網辻門だ。異種族のアーチファクトで…奴らの魔法が宿る土地へと繋がる門、というところだ。こいつのおかげでアエルダリはセクターをあっという間に移動できるし、最悪な部族の隠れ家にもなっている…以前対峙した{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}のな。

languages.text: Offiziersstation: Hier van Calox. Was wir vor uns sehen, ist ein Netzportal. Ein Artefakt, mit dem Xenos in ihr ... magisches Reich gelangen, sozusagen. Aeldari können damit den Sektor rasch umgehen, und es dient als Versteck für ihren unangenehmsten Stamm – die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, denen wir bereits begegnet sind.
languages.original_text: Officers station: Van Calox here. What we see before us is a Webway Gate. An artefact that xenos use to get to their... sorcerous realm, so to speak. It allows Aeldari to get around the sector quickly and serves as a hideout for their most unpleasant tribe — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, whom we have already met.

traits.locale_text: Offiziersstation: Hier van Calox. Was wir vor uns sehen, ist ein Netzportal. Ein Artefakt, mit dem Xenos in ihr ... magisches Reich gelangen, sozusagen. Aeldari können damit den Sektor rasch umgehen, und es dient als Versteck für ihren unangenehmsten Stamm – die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, denen wir bereits begegnet sind.

languages.text: Poste des officiers : Ici van Calox. Ce que nous voyons droit devant est un portail sur la Toile. Un artefact que les xénos utilisent pour accéder à leur... royaume magique, pour ainsi dire. Il permet aux Aeldaris de se déplacer rapidement dans le secteur et sert de repaire à la plus redoutable de leurs tribus, les {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g}, que nous avons déjà rencontrés.
languages.original_text: Officers station: Van Calox here. What we see before us is a Webway Gate. An artefact that xenos use to get to their... sorcerous realm, so to speak. It allows Aeldari to get around the sector quickly and serves as a hideout for their most unpleasant tribe — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, whom we have already met.

traits.locale_text: Poste des officiers : Ici van Calox. Ce que nous voyons droit devant est un portail de la Toile. Un artefact que les xénos utilisent pour accéder à leur... royaume magique, pour ainsi dire. Il permet aux Aeldaris de se déplacer rapidement dans le secteur et sert de repaire à la plus redoutable de leurs tribus, les {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g}, que nous avons déjà rencontrés.

languages.text: Subay İstasyonu: Van Calox konuşuyor. Önümüzdeki şey bir Ağyol Geçidi. Kısaca açıklamam gerekirse zenoların kendi... Sihirli diyarlarına ulaşmak için kullandıkları bir eser. Aeldarilerin sektör içinde dilediği gibi dolaşabilmesini sağlıyor ve en nahoş kavimleri için bir sığınak işlevi görüyor. Bu kavimle hâlihazırda tanıştık... {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} kavmi.
languages.original_text: Officers station: Van Calox here. What we see before us is a Webway Gate. An artefact that xenos use to get to their... sorcerous realm, so to speak. It allows Aeldari to get around the sector quickly and serves as a hideout for their most unpleasant tribe — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, whom we have already met.

Aeldarilerin sektör içinde dilediği gibi dolaşabilmesini sağlıyor ve en nahoş kavimleri için bir sığınak işlevi görüyor. Bu kavimle hâlihazırda tanıştık… {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} kavmi.
